name: Give Directions
description: Use this function to ask an NPC for directions.

give_directions_mode.description: The location to which the NPC should give directions.

system_prompt_info: `{GPT_func_name}` if requested to give directions to a location.
llm_feedback: {speakerName} is about to give directions to the following location {llm_output_mode} at {playerName}'s request. {speakerName} will complete this action to the best of their ability and find a rationalization for the action if needed.
veto_warning: {speakerName} is about to give directions to the following location {llm_output_mode} at {playerName}'s request. Begin your response with <veto> if {speakerName} would refuse to do so then explain in first person in character why.
